description: Enter the cumulative number of specimens rejected for testing to date.

criteria:

relatedArtifact.label: CMS Press Release
relatedArtifact.display: Trump Administration Engages Americaâ€™s Hospitals in Unprecedented Data Sharing

relatedArtifact.label: Vice President Pence Letter to Hospital Administrators
relatedArtifact.display: Text of a Letter from the Vice President to Hospital Administrators

relatedArtifact.label: AHA Advisory on COVID-19 Reporting
relatedArtifact.display: Administration Requests Hospitals Report Daily on COVID-19 Testing Results, Bed and Ventilator

relatedArtifact.label: Excel Spreadsheet template for reporting to FEMA
relatedArtifact.display: Template for Daily Hospital COVID-19 Reporting.xlsx

coding.display: Percent Positive among Newly Resulted Tests

code.text: # of new positive test results released / # of total new tests released for previous date queried
Midnight to midnight cutoff, tests ordered on previous date queried

population.description: Enter the number of new Diagnostic Tests Ordered/Received during the reporting period.

criteria.name: totalOrdersIncrease
criteria.expression:
ServiceRequest.where(
    authoredOn.toDate() = %reportingPeriod /* May need to change logic to support ranges for reportingPeriod */
    and status in ('active', 'completed')
    and intent in ('order', 'orginal-order', 'reflex-order', 'filler-order', 'instance-order')
)

code.text: Midnight to midnight cutoff, test results released on previous date queried

population.description:
nter the number of results recieved/generated during the reporting period.
Do not include results where the test could not be completed because the specimen
was rejected or a positive/negative result could not be established

criteria.name: totalTestResultsIncrease
criteria.expression:
DiagnosticReport.where(
    issued.toDate() = %reportingPeriod /* May need to change logic to support ranges for reportingPeriod */
    and status in ('final, 'amended', 'corrected', 'appended')
)

code.text: Midnight to midnight cutoff, positive test results released on previous date queried

population.description: Enter the number of positive test results released during the reporting period.

criteria.description: Result is positive with respect to COVID-19
criteria.name: positiveIncrease

coding.display: Cumulative Percent Positive among Resulted Tests

code.text: # of total positive results to released date / # of total tests results released to date

population.description: Enter the cumulative number of tests ordered to date.

criteria.description: Report all active or completed test orders for a COVID-19 test authored during the reporting period
criteria.name: totalOrders
criteria.expression:
ServiceRequest.where(
    authoredOn.toDate() <= %reportingPeriod /* May need to change logic to support ranges for reportingPeriod */
    and status in ('active', 'completed')
    and code in %ValueSet-COVID19DiagnosticTest
    and intent in ('order', 'orginal-order', 'reflex-order', 'filler-order', 'instance-order')
)

code.text: All specimens rejected for testing to date

population.description: Enter the cumulative number of specimens rejected for testing to date.

criteria.description: DiagnosticReport for COVID-19 where the report is unavailable because the measurement was not started or not completed.
criteria.name: rejected

code.text: All tests with results released to date

population.description:
nter the total number tests with results released to date. Do not include tests where a
positive/negative result could not be determined (e.g., because the specimen was inadequate).

criteria.description: Report all active or completed test orders for a COVID-19 test authored during or prior to the end of the reporting period that have had results released.
criteria.name: totalTestResults
criteria.expression:
ServiceRequest.where(
    status in ('active', 'completed')
    and intent in ('order', 'orginal-order', 'reflex-order', 'filler-order', 'instance-order')
)

code.text: All positive test results released to date

population.description: Enter the total number of positive test results release to date.

criteria.description: The result is positive for COVID-19
criteria.name: positive

coding.display: All Laboratory Reports for any Order

code.text: Reports to date including corrected, amended and canceled reports

population.description: This is in intermediate population used to simplify calculations

criteria.description: Diagnostic Reports provided in response to totalOrders
criteria.name: allReports

coding.display: Most Recent Laboratory Reports for any Order

code.text: Latest Reports to date for each order

population.description: This is in intermediate population used to simplify calculations

criteria.description: Most recent diagnostic reports provided in response to totalOrders
criteria.name: latestReports
